CustomField.description: This should be ticked if the word is multi word. For e.g. for record 'anti-social' this should be ticked. Also the record should be stored without special characters i.e. hyphens, spaces etc. So words like 'anit-social' will be stored as 'antisocial'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should be ticked if the word is multi word. For e.g. for record 'anti-social' this should be ticked. Also the record should be stored without special characters i.e. hyphens, spaces etc.
CustomField.label: Is Multi Word
